name: Heathrow Airport Holdings Limited
goal: Heathrow Airport Holdings Limited (HAL) owns and runs Heathrow Airport, the UK's aviation hub. HAL ensures the smooth operation and running of the airport.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
Our activities are based on EU initiatives and policies that would affect the operation of the airport. These are primarily general aviation policy concerns, for example SESAR policy and deployment, sustainability, slot regulation, and airspace policy e.g. EU Directive 598.

This can also concern other policy areas e.g. Brexit and trade.

Engagement on these matters may involve EU organisations including, but not limited to: European Parliament, Commission, Taskforce 50, DG Move and others.
